name: [🔥EARLY] Cube Simulator 2!
description:
THIS IS THE SECOND GAME IN THE CUBE SIM SERIES!
 A 2D and free remake of the popular roblox game called “pet simulator x” 

This game was made mostly by me with some extra help

I really worked hard on it and I hope you like it as much as I do!

Enjoy! :)

MOBILE!

to activate mobile click the settings icon and turn on the "DPAD" option
